posts.name: Pete Walters
posts.cooked:
Today, we’re releasing version 7.65 to beta. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta group.

Release notes:

  • Message status indicators (sent, delivered, etc.) are now supported by the iOS VoiceOver feature in order to improve accessibility for blind and low-vision individuals.

Let us know about any issues you experience! Thank you for being a beta tester!

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.64 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.65.0.842-beta

51 new commits since 7.64.0.834-beta (+ 1 commit omitted):

Show commits

  • Bump version to 7.65 [1]

  • Add "View Backup Key" to Backup Settings [2]

  • Refactor BackupAttachmentDownloadQueue [3]

  • Add cancellation support for web socket requests [4]

  • Change restore options based on path [5]

  • Increase last viewed threshold for attachment offloading to 7 days [6]

  • Asyncify some group link preview code [7]

  • Asyncify OneTimePaypalDonation [8]

  • Asyncify batchUpdateIdentityKeys [9]

  • Asyncify DonateViewController [10]

  • Fix two race conditions in unit tests [11]

  • Don’t store absolute paths for megaphone images [12]

  • Add Monitor primitive helper methods [13]

  • Send contact syncs via MessageSenderJobQueue [14]

  • Wait until all pending messages are sent [15]

  • Stop recomputing zero'd audio durations at read time [16]

  • Asyncify wrapPromiseInProgressView [17]

  • Asyncify paymentAuthorizationControllerForMonthly [18]

  • Asyncify Paypal monthly donations [19]

  • Asyncify paymentAuthorizationControllerForOneTime [20]

  • Asyncify didConfirmMonthlyDonationUpdate [21]

  • Asyncify “for a friend” credit/debit card flow [22]

  • Use webP for backup thumbnails [23]

  • Update mediaName derivation [24]

  • Allow Attachment plaintextHash to be set even if not a stream [25]

  • Update to LibSignal v0.74.1 (Backup.LocatorInfo.integrityCheck) [26]

  • Fix inverted check for thumbnails [27]

  • Fix OWSProgressTest flakes [28]

  • Generate thumbnails before offloading attachments [29]

  • Try to reuse existing encryption key when merging downloaded attachments with offloaded attachments [30]

  • Asyncify monthlyDonation [31]

  • Asyncify oneTimeDonation [32]

  • Asyncify iDEAL callback handling [33]

  • Add message delivery status to VoiceOver a11y label [34]

  • Store last backup date and backup size [35]

  • Asyncify assorted donation code [36]

  • Update to LibSignal v0.75.0 [37]

  • 64-digit -> 64-character [38]

  • Don't use CommonStrings.doneButton in CallDrawerSheet [39]

  • Add "Verify Backup Key" megaphone [40]

  • Tombstone unviewed view-once messages in remote backups [41]

  • Check both link-n-sync capabilities [42]

  • Allow cancelling from the restore screen during manual restore [43]

  • Include integrity check when re-encrypting attachment for upload [44]

  • Link previews for image URLs [45]

  • Split BackupAttachmentUploadManager into QueueRunner + Scheduler [46]

  • Move IncludedContentFilter to its own file [47]

  • Check BackupArchive.IncludedContentFilter when enqueuing backup attachment uploads [48]

  • Fix notification service change number handling [49]

  • Update release notes [50]

  • Update translations [51]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-iOS 7.64.0.834-beta…7.65.0.842-beta

Localization changes

Note: after clicking a link, it may take a few seconds before GitHub jumps to the file (try scrolling a bit if it doesn’t).

posts.name: Whatnoww

posts.name: Delamcode
posts.cooked: I can’t send attachments without waiting some 10min for it to send, this might be iOS 26 related though

Beta testing for this release has concluded. If you find any further bugs related to this release or earlier releases, please report them on GitHub (read How to Report Bugs for more information on how to do that).

If you have feedback specifically related to the new beta version, please post it in the following topic: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.66 release.
